data.comment: Today's referee, Jan Boterberg, has blown to start the match.
Liege have been given a penalty at Stade Maurice Dufrasne...
In the minute 31, Selim Amallah converts the penalty to give Liege a 1-0 lead.
Goal! Obbi Oulare extends Liege's lead to 2-0.
Nicolas Raskin with an assist there.
In the minute 36, Ilombe Mboyo keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Julien De Sart.
Kristof D'Haene is booked for the away team.
In the minute 45, Jan Boterberg blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The away team have replaced Eric Ocansey with Faiz Selemani. This is the first substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
In the minute 62, Philippe Montanier is making the team's first substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Michel Ange Balikwisha replacing Damjan Pavlovic.
Philippe Montanier (Liege) is making a second substitution, with Felipe Avenatti replacing Obbi Oulare.
Michiel Jonckheere is replacing Hannes Van Der Bruggen for Kortrijk at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
In the minute 78, Jovan Stojanovic is on a sub for Petar Golubovic for Kortrijk.
The home team replace Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez with Jackson Muleka.
Michiel Jonckheere (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Lucas Rougeaux (Kortrijk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
